name: Beetleform Mage
originalText: {G}{U}: Beetleform Mage gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

rulings.text: If Beetleform Mage’s ability is activated by one player, then another player gains control of it during the same turn, the second player can’t activate its ability that turn.
Activating Beetleform Mage’s ability after it’s been blocked by a creature without flying or reach won’t cause it to become unblocked.

text: {G}{U}: Beetleform Mage gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
